title: Escape Game-Based Learning for Clinical Decision-Making in Emergency Medicine

context.prior_knowledge: Basic first aid and understanding of emergency medical procedures
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive training course for current practitioners. Features online real-time collaborative learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners apply a three-stage (initial assessment-diagnostic reasoning-intervention selection) clinical decision-making process with 80% accuracy in emergency scenarios
Teams achieve 90% simulation task resolution within 60 minutes using role distribution and communication strategies among members
Learners identify and explain at least four triage classification criteria during digital puzzle-solving processes in an escape game
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
